wikipedia_page.main: Sam Kennedy (1896 – 9 December 1963) was an English professional footballer who was on the books of five different Football League clubs. He started his career as a right-half, but later played in the centre forward position.

response: * Sam Kennedy (American football) (born 1964), former American football linebacker
* Sam Kennedy (footballer, born 1881) (1881–1955), Scottish international footballer
* Sam Kennedy (baseball executive) (born 1973), president of the Boston Red Sox of Major League Baseball
* Sam Kennedy, an alias of tax protester Glenn Unger (born 1951)
